Miss Grit

Miss Grit is the solo project of Margaret Sohn, a New York-based musician.

Origin New York, New York, USA
Genres
  • Alt-rock
Years active 2018-present
Links
  • https://missgrit.com
  • https://missgrit.bandcamp.com
  • https://open.spotify.com/artist/0kUsW40KML1SWGeOAvGtzD
  • https://soundcloud.com/missgrit

Miss Grit produces introspective alt-rock that often brings to mind the noise and genre fusion of St. Vincent.
